================================================================================
FEATURES
================================================================================

✓ Image Resizing - Precise width and height control
✓ Web Presets - Instagram, Facebook, Twitter optimized sizes
✓ Quality Control - Adjustable JPEG/WebP quality (1-100%)
✓ Multiple Formats - Save as JPEG, PNG, or WebP
✓ Metadata Support - Add/edit Title, Author, Copyright, Description
✓ EXIF Preservation - Maintains camera information
✓ Blur Background - Add blur effect for vertical images in horizontal format
✓ Manual Crop - Interactive crop positioning
✓ File Size Estimation - Real-time size preview with color warnings
✓ Aspect Ratio Lock - Maintain or adjust image proportions

================================================================================
HOW TO USE
================================================================================

1. UPLOAD IMAGE
   - Click "📁 Upload Image" button
   - Select your image file (JPEG, PNG, WebP, etc.)

2. CHOOSE SIZE
   - Use Web Presets for social media
   - OR enter custom Width and Height
   - Toggle "Keep aspect ratio" as needed

3. ADJUST QUALITY
   - Move the Quality slider (higher = better quality, larger file)
   - Watch the estimated file size update

4. SELECT FORMAT
   - Choose JPEG (best for photos)
   - Choose PNG (best for graphics, larger files)
   - Choose WebP (best compression, modern format)

5. ADD METADATA (Optional)
   - Fill in Title, Author, Copyright, Description
   - This information will be embedded in the saved image

6. CROP/BLUR (Optional)
   - Enable "Crop to fit" for exact dimensions
   - Enable "Manual crop positioning" to choose crop area
   - Enable "Add blur effect" for vertical images in horizontal format

7. PREVIEW
   - Click "🔄 Update Preview" to see the result
   - Review the estimated file size

8. SAVE
   - Click "💾 Save Image"
   - Choose save location
   - Done!

================================================================================
FILE SIZE WARNINGS
================================================================================

The estimated file size is color-coded:

  GREEN  - Under 90 KB (optimal for web)
  ORANGE - 90-130 KB (acceptable)
  RED    - Over 130 KB (may be slow to load)

Note: PNG files tend to be larger. WebP offers best compression.

================================================================================
TROUBLESHOOTING
================================================================================

Q: Antivirus flags the file?
A: This is normal for PyInstaller executables. The file is safe.
   Add an exception in your antivirus software.

Q: Application won't start?
A: Make sure you're running on Windows 10 or 11.
   Try running as Administrator (right-click > Run as administrator).

Q: File size is large?
A: The ~30 MB includes Python and all libraries. This is normal for
   portable Python applications.

Q: Can't save images?
A: Make sure you have write permissions in the target folder.
   Try saving to Desktop or Documents.
